item.title: developers aiming to the wrong target
item.description: The Introduction I set a personal journey to understand software development in a more fundamental level. What is this thing that I like so much to do? and how to explain the unease feeling that most of my discussions with other practitioners are meaningless? The meaningless arises from my perception that discussing technical aspects of a problem has a strong diminishing returns component to it. For example, programming language choices.
